author: alexparvulescu
msg: OAK-2017 Add checkpoint management to oak-run

author: markt
msg: Avoid incorrect ISE if the timeout fires after a non-container thread has called dispatch() but before a container thread processed the dispatch()

author: markt
msg: Do not mark threads from the container thread pool as container threads when being used to process AsyncContext.start(Runnable) so processing is correctly transferred back to a genuine container thread when necessary.
